Header: Murder in Matara : Woman killed with chemical, another critical
Content: COLOMBO (News 1st): A woman died while another was admitted to the general hospital in Matara after being attacked with a chemical. A person has been arrested on suspicion of entering the house and attacking the women with the chemical. The police said that investigations are also underway to arrest a woman who is also a suspect. The murder was due to a land dispute between the two parties.Â The chemical used for the crime has been identified as a chemical used to produce jewellery. Further investigations are ongoing.
